author: terence0083
content:
For devnet4, are we purposely gossiping some blobs very late? I've seen a few

```
[2024-10-20 16:41:12] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not validate blob data availability: context deadline waiting for blob sidecars slot: 16560, BlockRoot: 0xc9607749ee1743bb2c2b68ff460710d562faa62c840b1a3bc92c1497372b7c9d: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/cb59b6ca/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
```
